mapper.update: update book_info set book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, translator = #{translator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isbn_code = #{isbnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comeup_time = #{comeupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, publish_company = #{publishCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, entering_men = #{enteringMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entering_date = #{enteringDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, book_name, author, translator, isbn_code, comeup_time, publish_company, state, entering_men, entering_date from book_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, book_name, author, translator, isbn_code, comeup_time, publish_company, state, entering_men, entering_date from book_info
